name: Cardboard Football Club
description:
Cardboard Football Club Premium is a highly addictive skill-based soccer game. Combining outstanding gameplay, colorful graphics, great audio effects and local multiplayer it is one of the most original and fun sport games on the Apple App Store.

- High quality real-time 3D graphics
- Local multiplayer
- Easy, normal and ‘brütal’ single-player game modes
- Great soundtracks and audio effects
- Fun and addictive game-play elements
